articles.title: The Patriots didn’t finish the way their 2001 ancestors did. Let’s hope they don’t produce a similar follow-up season, either.

summary: The 2002 Patriots missed the playoffs after a successful 2001 Super Bowl season.
Offseason moves contributed to the team's decline, similar to past patterns.
Boston fans worry about repeating the disappointing follow-up season.

articles.title: Asparagus could soon become Massachusetts’ official state vegetable

summary: Massachusetts lawmakers are considering a bill to designate asparagus as the official state vegetable.
